name: Extreme Bike Race: Rival Rider
description:
Chose from a variety of stunt and race bikes to jump, slide, smash and ride your way though the massive open world. Pick up stunts and NO2 along the way and get some crazy air!

Extreme Bike Race Driving brings the most realistic bike driving physics with the most epic of environments to race super fast motorbikes.

Here are some cool new features in this game:
- Amazingly massive world environments, filled full of insane stunts to try!
- Realistic motorbike controls
- Huge city, offroad, airport maps!
- Realistic camera angles
- Gain supercharged nitro boost by collecting NOZ bottles, collect more to unlock more bikes!
- Dynamic lights and sounds
- Incredible motorbikes to ride, each bike unique with style, looks and skills!
- Advanced motorbike driving physics engine designed especially for bikes.
